column4: (2nd time) When I send an email message from my PHP scripts, it works if I send to my cell phone, but not if I send to my hotmail or gmail accounts.  I tried mailq and it told me all the unsuccessful messages were "frozen."  I tried to unfreeze them and could not.  Any help?
sending php links from emails sometimes fails for me to.
what do you suggest?  I need this to work 100%.
i cant suggest something sorry :( i just verify that it does happen
